description: '''Elysha Zaide''', known professionally by her artist name '''ill-esha''' ({{IPAc-en|ɪ|ˈ|l|iː|ʃ|ə}}), is a Canadian [[electronic music]] artist, producer, singer, and DJ. She is known for her work in [[bass music]], as well as for her performance style of singing and DJing simultaneously.
